title: having a meta just proves that people are brainless zombies who don't think for themselves.
body:
playing something unconventional against the "meta" significantly increases your chance of winning simply because those who only play meta (aka everyone) will not know how to deal with it.

unfortunately, this can also lower your chance of winning because the brainless zombies (your teammates) will think that you're trolling for simply not conforming to the meta, so they will intentionally troll the game.

there's no room for thinking in today's society.
